While we're looking to destroy rival clans, maintaining
relations to gain allies and trade partners, also works in our favour.

This map on the Diplomacy Panel displays the current attitude
of surrounding provinces to our clan. Red indicates hostility;

provinces in green view us more favourably. We can get the same
view for any of the clans we've met by selecting them to change

Let's open negotiations with a rival clan. Note our current
relationship status; this will have a major bearing on our talks.

Once negotiations begin, we can then build offers and demands
and counter any offers made to us via this panel.
